website_summaries.verdict: The memory foam makes this a comfortable choice that comes in several sizes.
pros: A very comfortable sack covered in a soft fabric
Comes in several sizes and colors
cons: The cover is not removable for cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs - difference in amount of stuffing
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping the seller will see this review and respond to me through an email. I actually LOVE the chairs. I ordered 3. One was very full and great, the 2nd was a little less full but still great, but the 3rd is only 1/2 the size of the others with the filling inside. I'm surprised. I'm just having a hard time figuring out how to get hold of the seller to say "I don't want to send it back, I'd just like to purchase more stuffing for the 3rd chair. Here is a photo of the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Desrosiers

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are a LIE!
customer_reviews.text: This product claims to be 4ft diam. x 30in high. It is only 3ft diam. x 22in high. Imagine my 5 year old daughter's disappointment when she worked really, really hard for 2 weeks to earn a 4 foot wide bean bag that she can lay across (she's 3'10"). And what she gets is not even close. Needless to say there was a good deal of crying. I have no idea how I'm going to return this thing now that it's all puffed up, but I will have to figure something out. By the way - These photos were taken after the bag had been out of the box for 12 hours, so it isn't getting any bigger.
customer_reviews.author: jrymat

customer_reviews.title: Big size as advertised and well packed
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the material bc u can see all the dust and my dog hair stick to it. If u have a pet don't buy it. I don't like the felling as it compressed easily; my other bean bag is filled with small little Styrofoam and it's more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Eating animals is weird

customer_reviews.title: Underfilled, difficult, and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: First thing to know... This bag shows up as a brick. It's packed into a small box and compacted to a point that makes it really difficult to break up. After finally getting it broken up I realized that there is a at most 2/3 of the amount of foam actually needed for this to act as a functional beanbag. The shell material is comfortable but it needs way more foam inside the bag, and you can feel all the little individual pieces when you Do sit in it. If your goal is to find a confortable beanbag to relax in I highly suggest you find an actual beanbag and not this product. It's just not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but cover not really removable
customer_reviews.text: We've had this bean bag for over a year, it's super comfortable. Last night my son threw up all over it and we thought "no problem, zip off the cover, toss it in the washing machine and it will be good as new" - no such luck. The cover is not actually removable despite the massive zipper, there is no under layer, just millions of foam bits directly inside the suede. So now we have to get rid of the whole thing, the barf has soaked all the way through and there is no way to get it to properly dry on the inside. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy! don’t buy chill sack!Even without inner great
customer_reviews.text: Really really like this one! Better than chill sack. If it came with an inner liner so I can wash it ,I would give 5 stars! It is far more stuffing,firmer,and comfier than chill sack. I sure wish I bought it for me instead of the chill sack. I bought this one for my daughters mermaid theme room and it is lovely! And huge! Even compared to my 5ft chillsack ! I would definitely say buy this you won’t regret. We started using it the day we got it. Spent 10-15 minutes pulling apart the foam and that’s about the same amount of time for the chill sack . Expanded beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I only took 1 star off because the color pink is definitely not the shade depicted in the picture. I was wanting more of the berry color that it appears and it is a lighter pink. It definitely takes time to get to full size. I think it took about a week with my son and I taking turns breaking up the foam inside it but it's great for watching movies and is the perfect size for the height that I have my tv.
customer_reviews.author: Liz F

customer_reviews.title: Not quite super fluffy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter as a reading chair and a place to only read (no devices). I figured she would love sitting in it and it would encourage reading. That part has worked. What I don’t love is how it needs to be fluffed after each time you sit in it and how hard that is for a young person to do. It never really initially fully fluffed up either, so I always feel like it looks frumpy. For the price I wish it was easier to move around and it should absolutely have an inner liner so it can be washed. In retrospect I might have chosen another kind.
customer_reviews.author: BecsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for a good price
customer_reviews.text: We have two bags like this now and they hold up better than traditional "bean" filled bags. The microfiber cover also looks nicer and feels better on the skin than traditional bean bag chairs with the plasticky feel. I was looking for a bag for my 11 year old son and found a slightly smaller bag at Target for $20-$30, but I could tell it was one of those that would be flat within just a few months, so I hopped right on to Amazon and ordered this one, while standing in Target. Great decision!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, super comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Very big and super comfortable. We liked this so much we purchased a second one! The only complaint is that it is a major pain to get out of the bag. They wrap it in like a big garbage bag so when you are trying to unzip it the plastic gets caught in the zipper. Even when we expected it the second time it was still a mess. Once you get it opened, you're good to go! It does take a couple of days to fully fill out so don't panic when it's still small right out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: A. Royce

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality-Larger than Expected
customer_reviews.text: This is much larger than it looks. Memory foam is better than traditional bean bag. It was quite a bit of work getting all the small foam pieces pulled apart to expand. After 4-5 days as instructions indicate for full expansion it fluffed right up....BUT...there isn’t quite enough foam in the bag. It’s okay but little disappointed. Would recommend though over traditional bean bags. Would have given a 5 star if it had a bit more foam. Otherwise very well made, material is good quality, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: We are so glad to have ordered this bean bag chair
customer_reviews.text: We are so glad to have ordered this bean bag chair. It's very good quality and the material is the micro-fiber suede (or something to that effect). The chair is extremely comfortable, I've fallen asleep in it as we've watched TV and had the fire going. Must fight off the pups to get into it, as they love it even more than we do - lol. We ordered the camel color, which is lovely and goes with lots of color schemes. I'd like to order another for one of the bedrooms in a different color. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product!
customer_reviews.text: One of the worse products I have ever bought. Foam is awful...there is no give...can't sit comfortably at all. It's a 4' diameter, 2' high blob. My grandson is not happy. And to return it, Amazon is graciously sending a shipper to pack and pick it up. It comes in a small box and expands to the full size and no way I could ship it now. Amazon is being great about the return!
customer_reviews.author: REV

customer_reviews.title: Great, just wish you could machine wash the cover
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this bean bag. My only complaint is that you can't removed the cover to wash it... well you can, you'd just release ALL of the tiny foam bits which seem pretty impossible to get them back it. I had a kid throw up on ours so we had to settle for spot cleaning with a carpet clean attachment. The color didn't fade with the cleaning so thats good.
customer_reviews.author: mcabbie

customer_reviews.title: Adult sized. My 49" 7 yr old can stretch out and sleep comfortably
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It's a beautiful bean bag, with lots of buoyancy. When I ordered it, I thought it'd be smaller, as the description recommended its use for children under age 12. This is a bean bag that will allow children to sprawl out and sleep, full-body supported. If you just want something for your kids to lean on while reading or watching tv, go for the 3' version. Save some money and some space in your home!
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Ain’t no beanbag
customer_reviews.text: Not a beanbag by any stretch of the imagination. Too heavy / too bulky to move easily from place to place. Whereas with a “beanbag” you can essentially flop into it and find your own center by merely wriggling into it. This is giant sack of lumps. Comfy? No. Get up “fluff fluff fluff” and repeat. Additionally, good luck returning it. Was packed in the vacuum of outer space so once you unpackage it, you own it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Way bulky and heavy. Not a bean bag.
customer_reviews.text: This “bean bag” is way oversized and takes way too much space, it is way too heavy since its actually filled with pieces of memory foam, not easy to move from around. Way heavy and way too big bought it for my 14 yr old son and he doesn’t enjoy it at all and takes all the free space in his room. I need to get rid of it now and I doubt anybody will get close to pay what I paid for it. Is in new condition and it’s been a headache and eye sore 😩
customer_reviews.author: GCasario

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product was chosen by my 11 year old, she wanted a bean bag so bad. We were both so very happy with it! The unraveling of a square shaped bag into a beautiful huge, round bag filled with stuffing! It was the coolest thing to see . It was compressed for shipping. The price is hefty but I’m telling you, it’s so worth it! I would buy one for myself if I had the room lol I definitely recommend this product! Great quality, so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Keller

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam bean bag is far more comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Great memory foam bean bag...very comfortable and huge! Way bigger than we expected. It was a gift for my young teen. He loves it. I'm getting a little too old for bean bags but I have to admit the memory foam is far more comfortable to sit in it and it gives great support and not as awkward getting out of it...haha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different than last time
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened this time. The entire bean bag was vacuum packed. Foam was loose in the bag and all over the outside. Sent back for replacement. Bought one last month that had foam vacuum packed in a mesh bag while the outer bag was folded separately. Hope the next one is better.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Made well and big but still wasnt enough stuffing for me...for the price
customer_reviews.text: Disapponted that for cost this doesnt have more stuffing. Even after waiting for gel foam to rise and doing some fluffling, it still seems a bit flat. I had to buy more foam stuffing. Otherwise its big and appears to be made well, soft. Its has double stitching and an outward lining with a second inward lining, which is good for preventing tears and leaks from use.
customer_reviews.author: TT its me

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I had a Big Joe styrofoam beanbag. I hated how noisy and uncomfortable the the styrofoam was on the Big Joe. This bean bag is great! Don’t worry, it may seem small at first, but once you beat it up and fluff it, after a couple hours It will reach it’s intended size. I was not expecting it to be so big. Comfortable. No problems yet!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Sizes extremely different between two of the same bags
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, one in pink and one in blue for my kids for Christmas. I waited too long to open the boxes and realized the two are completely different sizes. The blue is flat while the pink is extremely full. I'm going to have to put some of the foam from hers into his to make them more even. I'm very disappointed. Now ill have to order extra foam to fill them out. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: J&J Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sack
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 4’ sack and even though reading reviews and measurements, i was surprised at how large it is. My average size 9.5 year old son can completely curl up on it. The outer shell is a softer and nicer material than expected. The navy color is quite dark. I feel like I this was a great value for the quality of the product! I’m afraid of ever having to wash it because it’s so enormous.
customer_reviews.author: Getitgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is good for the price! Comfortable however it didn’t plump up like it shows in the picture. It looks more like a bean bag and sits lower to the ground than I expected but works for my 10 year old in his room!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Clapp

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the pricture
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about ordering this originally as there appear to be hot and cold reviews. After receiving the bean bag chair and I definitely say it met my expectations and more. It is large enough for my kid to comfortably sit in and lounge in (he is 5'5 150 lbs) It was stuffed with enough memory foam for him to sit up it just like the picture. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This item is way better than I expected and also way bigger! Super comfy and if you prop it with a wall or couch base it makes a wonderful lounge chair... I am 6ft tall and it is perfect for my size! Con: it need a prop if you want back stabilization or it just slumps over. I would still highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: astoria

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I got my order before I expected. I waited 3 days for it to " inflate" it got really big but it seemed to not be completely full of the foam. In spite of this, I find it to be really comfortable but more of a bed than a chair. Great to watch TV or movies on just doesn't sit like a chair. At this point I'm wondering how long it will last .
customer_reviews.author: Bratpak

customer_reviews.title: Not fully stuffed
customer_reviews.text: They sent the wrong color. Since they ran out of pink they ended up sending it coverless. Or with a cheap tan covering nothing like the red cover. It was half as stuffed as the other one I ordered at the same time. Worst smell to them but it is fading now that it’s been open for 3 weeks. They are still great but a little disappointed in the fact that it’s not very stuffed and you hit the floor when you sit in it (30lb)
customer_reviews.author: Kort

customer_reviews.title: I underestimated the size.
customer_reviews.text: I got two 4 foot bean bag chairs. One for me and one for my boyfriend as gaming chairs. I forgot that it was 4 foot and I didn't think it was going to be that big. Oh how wrong I was. I'm 5'5 and my boyfriend is 6'4 and it swallows me. My boyfriend loves it, it's the perfect size for him. Very comfortable, I fell asleep in mine but I get very sweaty in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these - a pink and a purple. The purple is correct, came with outer cover and inner cover with foam in it so you can wash the outer cover. The pink however, has the zippers sewn together and there is no inner cover. I reached out to the company and Amazon and have been happy with the resolution. The bean bag chair is great if you get the one that has a separate outside cover and foam in an inside separate bag. Nice colors and material and expand in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy again and again
customer_reviews.text: It's not going to be easy to clean I was hoping that it had an inner layer that held the foam and then an outer shell but that's not the case anyway came quicker than I thought and with a little fluffing we got to use it right away! Am going to try and find one with a washable outer cover but if not will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Keefers

customer_reviews.title: Love the cover; plenty large for 65 pound child
customer_reviews.text: The 4 foot diameter bag is generous for my son who is 4 1/2 feet tall and 65 pounds. You can flop right into it without hitting the ground, or fluff it up to get in a more seated position. I wish it would have expanded a little bit more, and may consider adding additional foam. You do have to “beat it up“ for the first several days. Best quality cover I have seen (kind of a velvet) in bold colors.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 12 yr daughter. She loves it. She has even taken naps on it. Even my husband fell asleep on it while watching TV. So yea, it is comfortable and supportive. only let down is that in the pics it appears to have a shape (lounge chair) but it does not. It is a blob and just a bit heavy. cumbersome to move from one room to another. But regardless, happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: but I'm glad I took the risk
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews saying it was too small or not fluffy enough, but I'm glad I took the risk. OMG this thing is enormous, and beyond comfortable. You just need to take 5 minutes to break up the memory foam inside, it wasn't an issue at all. Everyone in the house wants one now, I might have to throw away the sofa and just fill the living room with these!! I was sent the wrong color but the seller very quickly resolved the issue by sending a new cover right away. Thrilled with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I did not open mine until after the return date because I was taking it to college with me. It is smaller than listed. It is very heavy. It is not comfortable because it does not offer support for your back. I wish I could return it and get my money back. It is not worth $131 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bob

customer_reviews.title: Can't wash it
customer_reviews.text: I would rate it a fivr if you could remove the cover to wash it some time. Also the stuffing could be a tad more firm, overall love it
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: Needs more stuffing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these and am somewhat happy with them. My only complaint is a little false advertisement. In pictures and video it looks full but actually after fluffing and having it out of box for over a week and a half it has not fluffed up to my expectations. Needs more filling. Not sure how to contact the manufacturer. Material seems durable and definitely well made.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: A half-full balloon.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is an absolute disgrace. This looks nothing like the phone. The price is waaaay too much for this thing that's like a balloon with two tiny breaths of air in it. Pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Plush , made to last , gorgeous beanbags !
customer_reviews.text: So plush , comfy for growing pre teen to teen kids and even adults ! This is not your average plastic beanbag from the 80’s this was a great option for me to create a comfy kids zone in our open floor plan that everybody can enjoy ! The beanbags are large , comfy and high quality ! Great for reading , napping , movie night , cuddling and gaming.
customer_reviews.author: esther

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 35 year old daughter for her one year olds room, and she’s obsessed with it. So comfy, it’s very functional, sturdy, made well, and the kids love it too! Great size, and fabric seems to repel spills, or good. A score for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Brazer

customer_reviews.title: You will freak!
customer_reviews.text: This product comes in like no other! You will freak when you get it. After messing with it for an hour you'll get it to fluff up but it's a bunch of phone basically and not enough to make the bean bag comfortable. I've never seen anything like it. Big though!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Kids and dogs love these bean bags.
customer_reviews.text: The kids and dogs think these bean bags are so comfortable. The fabric is very soft and durable so far. The only problem is that I have no idea how I'm going to deep clean these. So far, we're stuck with Febreeze. The memory form is loose inside the cover so you can't just take it off and throw it in the washer. If they made an inner cover, these would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Raison

customer_reviews.title: This is huge! But besides that great comfortable ect.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge!!!!! Way bigger then I thought. Needs its own closet to store. But, everyone loves it. Kids love it. My husband loves it. I hate it. Because it is so big. But I am out numbered on this one. Make sure you need something the size of possible a love seat. Ps great color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Huge but great!
customer_reviews.text: The bags are HUGE! Not sure how tall the model is but I'm 5'5" and it surrounds me with extra space. We bought the 4' bags for our kids and they love them. They are soft and very comfy. The bags are HEAVY - the foam filling is more heavy than traditional bean bags. They take a lot of muscle to lift and move; barely fitting through our standard sized door. With all that said, they are great and leave room to grow into!
customer_reviews.author: workingparents

customer_reviews.title: The damn bag came less than half full
customer_reviews.text: Ok don’t show me a pic of a full bag and then send me one that’s 1/3 full I have had to buy a 5 lid filler bag and a 2 1/2 pound filler bag $75 more than what I wanted to spends a good ole switch and bait scam
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Followed instructions upon receiving, but now it is flat.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this bean bag online, but despite following the sellers instructions it is now flat. The first 5 days we flipped it and fluffed it. We broke up the bigger pieces of foam fill, but there are still some larger pieces that I can't break apart, unless I unzip it, which will make a mess, as there is no inner liner. The outer cover is nice and soft, so that was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for game room or bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how small the box was to how large the bean bag got. Took about 20 hours to expand to full size. HUGE! Comfortable. A great purchase! Pleasantly surprising!
customer_reviews.author: Darkzygote

customer_reviews.title: So sweet, we bought another one
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loved jumping on this and doing obstacle courses that we bought another one for my other daughter. My wife also loves sitting and working from the beanbag cause its so soft unlike the old beanbags I had as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these in lime green 10 days ago for my grandkids . Got 1 red one today. Opened it figuring the red was a bag holding the foam. Nope! It grew really big, it’s never going to fit in the box to return. And where is the other one? Not happy. Lots of work for me to return. Called the customer service, yeah they were closed.
customer_reviews.author: Florida transplant

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw with zipper makes the bag unusable.
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year, the zipper has separated. Looked closely at it and there is no lock at the beginning. The manufacturer makes it impossible to reset the zipper because the tracks are on a loop. In other words, a rip off. Never buying from this manufacturer or seller again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: This bean bag is awesome. I kinda wish i ordered a bigger one. It is actually soft and gets softer the more its fluffed and used. It seems to be great quality and i hope it holds up to a teenager use. Like some i didnt know if it would fully fluff up but it did pretty quick. they give directions for you to help it along.
customer_reviews.author: tbond

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to our playroom!
customer_reviews.text: My children bought this sack chair as part of their Christmas giftcard haul. No regrets, they love it! It's much better, bigger, more velvety, and comfortable than we hoped. It looks and feels great in our playroom!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. W

customer_reviews.title: Great beanbag chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my college aged son. He was skeptical at first. It came VERY compressed in a box. It took less than 24 hrs to decompress. He loves it! Hard to transport in a car though because of its size.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Give it a few days to fully expand
customer_reviews.text: It Came in a much smaller box then I expected. Packed well. It took a couple of day to come to full size once out of the box . The velvet feel of the material is nice and comfy. I bought the small and it’s bigger then I thought. It’s very comfortable to sit in. I have it only a month and I hope it keeps its form. I would recommend buying it. I bought it for my sons room .
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: It is very comfortable and I love that it is NOT filled with beans.
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted it for his reading time. He loves it. I only gave it 4 stars because it took weeks for it to "inflate" and the smell was awful. We put it in the basement for about 2 weeks until the smell dissipated. It gave us headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little work but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a 4 only because it took alot of manual time to fluff the product up. It may have eventually filled up to size but it was extremely compacted when opening. Once I broke the huge ball up i began to grab pieces of the foam FROM THE OUTSIDE through the cover and pulled apart. Theres alot of cover to maneuver around to do this. I do not recommend unzipping the cover. It fluffed up to be pretty big. My 13yr old is extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Potential there, lacking follow through.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a like new product when I picked this up from the warehouse yet this product is super faded, there’s a patched bleach stain (see picture) and there are a few tiny holes that look like cigarette burns. If there was no patch or holes and it wasn’t faded to almost a lavender color, this would be alright but I’m not happy with this purchase. Especially given that now the brand new one is only $5 more than I paid for this particular used one.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Pre-teen LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my petite 12 yo and she loves it. Right away she said she fell asleep in it. Not too big for her (crowded) room but an excellent size for comfort. Shipped right away and easy to “fluff.”
customer_reviews.author: Roz Eiler

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy & Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Super comfortable, and it is the most sought after seat (by adults) in our house! I do wish it had a liner inside because if you want to wash the removable cover, you’ll have to be cool with a foam disaster everywhere. Despite this, an awesome product. Takes a bit to fully expand, so be patient. There was a light smell at first that went away after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: jnd0916

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Rey heavy and the stuffing was solid like a rock. I kneaded the stuffing for 45 minutes trying to loosen it up but to no avail. I will give it a little more time for the stuffing to distribute itself so the chair becomes comfortable and not hard and lumpy
customer_reviews.author: paula d. kelber

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe it when my son told me that he wanted a $100 bean bag. I couldn't imagine a bean bag worth $100. And then this monster showed up on my doorstep. HO-LEY COW!!! It took a long time to get it all 'fluffed up', but now it is amazing. Super comfy, HUGE (seriously, it's bigger than it looks based on the product pic) well made, sturdy, and soft. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kris KC

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: Mine came just like the picture shows. Once all the filler was activated it worked great. Make sure you follow instructions, move it around a bit and it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Zach g

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter and she loves it, it’s huge once you unpack it and let it sit for a couple days, you also have to massage this foam inside and it’ll get even bigger
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Kimmell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter for Christmas and she LOVED it!! Came in a smallish box but after I took it out and followed the directions, it was huge! It was a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ramberg

customer_reviews.title: Huge & kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: They are big enough for an adult and perfect for the kids to lounge and play. You have to break apart the memory foam and wait 2-5 days before they will be their full size. We haven’t had to use it yet, but the removable covers are very nice to be able to keep them clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kristoffer A Ison

customer_reviews.title: so comfy
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were the most comfortable chairs that I have ever sat in. My kids enjoyed opening the packaging and the are always upstairs on the chairs for hours. They even sometimes fall asleep in the chairs. There is nothing to debate here... these chairs are comfy and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: This is soooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have this bean bag for over 4 months and it is still so comfortable! It hasn't even lost a little shape. I use it a lot. It really is a great edition to my bedroom! The only annoying part is that if it gets dirty, there is almost no way to clean it because if you take the cover off, you'll be left with a pile of foam. Overall, this is a great buy for me. Don't hesitate. Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A Rubin

customer_reviews.title: ridiculous and you can't sit up in it like photo shows
customer_reviews.text: So heavy after it expands, ridiculous and you can't sit up in it like photo shows, uncomfortable! Way heavy and can't get it through a doorway. Wish I could leave no star
customer_reviews.author: jjbb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product don’t ever buy this. This bean bag was way to big for my children’s room then the smell was awful I had it for two weeks and still the smell is lingering and making me nauseous. The worst part of all is I cannot send it back because it came vacuum packed in a small pouch once you open it your doomed, UPS cannot pick it up because it needs to go back into the pouch which is impossible since the pouch is the 1/4 of the size of the sack.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Happiness
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had sent me a message when I was asking for gift ideas for my granddaughter for Christmas. She mentioned that one of her friends had one when my granddaughter went for a sleep over & absolutely loved it. Didn't even know that this kind of beanbag option was out there. Ended up getting the 4' one in dark blue. Even that size is big enough that she fell asleep in it one night since she's had it. Best gift ever! She's in it everyday at some point. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This has been "expanding" since Christmas. It still looks about half as full as what is pictured. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Miner

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: For a second I thought it was small because of the package it came in but when we took it out of the box and followed instructions. This is just the right size bean bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Lopez

customer_reviews.title: wasnt sure what to expect
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure after reading the reviews. I bought the 4' and was expecting a soso result. breaking apart the fiber was a bit tough. I did it to speed up the expansion. This thing is filling out amazingly after 3 days. and is still getting bigger. I am very happy with this. I think the directions in the buying part could say a bit more in the expansion time. but out and out...besides the time frame in buying and being ready to give as a gift...i would give it a five.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 4’ size. Very big and very heavy. Good quality! My 10 year old loves it! It does take up a lot of space. Would like there to be an inner cover to be able to wash the outer cover.
customer_reviews.author: RImomto3

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice quality bean bag (foam insert actually). The bag is well made and the cover is super soft which comes off to wash it. The 4ft is a good size for a teenager, we just bought the 5ft one for our other daughter. This is a great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A 2 year olds dream
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's favorite hangout. She loves to run and jump into the beanbag and sit and watch movies with her cat. When it flattens out a bit every month or so, I just roll it on the sides like a dough ball and it plumps right up again.
customer_reviews.author: Block Doc

customer_reviews.title: Feels like you are sitting on a old lumpy couch
customer_reviews.text: The foam stuffing (which is not memory foam) for the bean bag is cut/torn into pieces that are way too large. Feels like you are sitting on a old lumpy couch. In addition some of the foam pieces have hard crusty ends. I could have done a better job myself with a trash bag and a box of packing peanuts. And yes, I did follow the mfg instructions and roll the bag to break up the pieces that are stuck together and waited several days for the foam to un-compress after shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Shumway

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but smelly
customer_reviews.text: So the Sofa Sack itself is definitely comfortable and fluffed up well. But for some reason it has a smell to it, almost like sawdust, which has made my whole room smell that way. I really like the chair but cannot use if it makes my whole room smell that way. It also seems to be causing my allergies to flare up.
customer_reviews.author: P. C. Shear

customer_reviews.title: lumpy
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with how lumpy it feels. It's been over a week and still doesn't seem overly-full. When you lay down on it, you basically touch the floor. I'll likely be returning if i can figure out how to get it back in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bean bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice color. Dark navy microsuede. Huge, tons of loft after fluffing. Son loves it for gaming, and so does our dog!
customer_reviews.author: JJNSAM

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: This thing is wonderful. Incredibly comfortable. First time I ever actually passed out on a piece of furniture. In a small living room area with a TV and coffee table with a tabletop firepit. One of the best investments I made and will definitely buy another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bean bag, is very comfortable, soft and bigger that we thought. The only down side is that we can not washed it.
customer_reviews.author: Tali

customer_reviews.title: But best of all it's very comfortable and easy for this ...
customer_reviews.text: Soooo comfy!!! I live in a tiny house and this bean bag chair functions well in my small place and looks classy. But best of all it's very comfortable and easy for this almost 60 yr old woman to get in and out of. Love this chair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dona

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice material but the only bummer is that it needs more fill since it does not stand up stiffer like the pic shows....so buy extra fill
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Muñoz

customer_reviews.title: So comfy, for any and all sizes
customer_reviews.text: So easy to expand; just give it s few kicks and punches while flipping around and within moments it will start to get it’s shape. after 2 days it had fully expanded and is beyond comfortable that I being a 6ft 3in 240 lb man took a catnap. Amazingly comfy. Worth every dollar
customer_reviews.author: Juan Grillchees

customer_reviews.title: comes compressed in a bag but it’s so big!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s bigger than it looks my doughter loves it, it came in a small fabric bag and once you get it out and begin playing with it grows and grows it says 2-4 to fully grow but my daughter manage to do it in a few hours of playing and bouncing arround
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Is it supposed to be this flat?
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't look like the picture at all. If I knew it would be this flat I'd not have ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and great support
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, bag came a bit flat and they sent over more filling. Would definitely purchase again! My dog loves it too
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: This Bean Bag Chair is huge. 3 kids can sit on it and watch TV. It is very conformable and love the memory foam in it. Much better than an ordinary bean bag chair
customer_reviews.author: Wapak_Vornado

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase!! My children love this beanbag and I've fallen asleep in it a bunch of times already! Make sure you read the size carefully and check your measurements! Now if only i had a little more living room to go with my HUGE beanbag chair!
customer_reviews.author: Bratt

customer_reviews.title: Blob
customer_reviews.text: Tends flatten out, different than the picture. Takes more floor space than anticipated. Not as soft as expected either, but my son likes it well enough.
customer_reviews.author: BZinCA

customer_reviews.title: Big bag
customer_reviews.text: When bag arrived in a smaller box I thought I was shipped the wrong item. However after released from it's zipped enclosure, bag fluffed out. I bought this for my 11 year old grandson and it so large he can actually sleep in it. He loves it and I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Falk

customer_reviews.title: Not fully expanding At all
customer_reviews.text: It never fully expanded and doesn’t look like a bag bean sofa at all. It looks like a bag filled improperly with foam.
customer_reviews.author: Homi93

customer_reviews.title: The Sofa Sack Bean Bag you'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: The Sofa Sack Bean Bag was for my granddaughter, she loves it. She watches tv in it, sleeps in it, plays in it. I would recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bean Bag!
customer_reviews.text: We just love this Bean Bag. It is huge and very comfortable. Our autistic son wanted it for the living room so he could relax and stretch out and watch tv with the family. The only thing we would love even more would be...if it had handles on the sides so you could easily move/slide it from place to place (it is very heavy.) Other then that, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No where close to the colors they show
customer_reviews.text: Had these been anywhere close to the colors displayed (I bought a 4' in Magenta and 6' in chocolate) I would have rated this much higher. The magenta came in Pepto Bismol pink and chocolate in a lighter brown. When I contacted the seller they said that it was the correct color.!!! These colors are very deceiving, not even just a little off.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this beanbag chair! Nice green color! Machine washable! SUPER comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Parents of 5

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is there is no inner bag to ...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is there is no inner bag to hold the foam in so you can wash the cover.
customer_reviews.author: debbie campbell

customer_reviews.title: Huge and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my college student for her room. It's huge and comfortable. She fits her entire body on it and easily falls asleep. She LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Rancho Customer

product_meta.title: Sofa Sack - Plush, Ultra Soft Bean Bag Chair - Memory Foam Bean Bag Chair with Microsuede Cover - Stuffed Foam Filled Furniture and Accessories for Dorm Room - Navy 4'
product_meta.description:
Color:NavyThe Perfect Chair For Little Kids, Big Kids, and Adults That Are Kids At Heart
A retro staple with a modern twist, this supersoft bedroom, dorm, playroom, and nursery accessory is both stylish and fun. A throwback to the 60’s, the Sofa Sack hippy bean bags embrace the laid-back attitude of an earlier time. With a sturdy yet very comfortable structure of memory foam stuffing, double-stitched passion suede, and an assortment of colors and sizes for the choosing, this versatile line of boys, girls and teenage room furnishings is the perfect addition to your home. Great for reading, watching movies, playing videos games, or just lounging, the Sofa Sack bean bag collection is a must for every room. They are also great for daycares, classrooms, preschools, libraries, and study rooms. At 4’ around, this fun bean bag is the perfect one-man seat.

The Perfect Gift
These adult size memory foam chairs make fun, unique presents for birthdays, Christmas, graduations, baby showers, and housewarmings.

Product Details:
Dimensions: 30" H x 48" W x 48"
Microsuede, Ultra Soft Fabric
feature_bullets: THE PERFECT BEDROOM ACCESSORY: Simple and soft, The Sofa Sack individual bean bag chair is the perfect addition to every nursery, playroom, child’s bedroom, or basement. Incredibly comfortable and highly functional, this sofa is a perfect compliment to any decor.

A BEAN CHAIR WITHOUT BEANS: These colorful, personal beanless bags are comprised of memory foam, which is much more fluffy than bean filled chairs. Besides contouring to your body better, they also last longer by maintaining their structure over prolonged use.

QUALITY CONSTRUCT: Our bean bag furniture for adults and kids is made with durable foam stuffing, encased in velvet, passion suede with double stitching for maximum strength. Designed to support small rowdy toddlers up to large men and women, these stuffed chairs are built to last.

CONFORM TO COZY: Supersoft and velvety to the touch, these multicolor bean bags are great for sitting, napping, and lounging. 30" off the ground and 48” x 48” in size, babies, toddlers and kids will love how much room they offer while adults enjoy the single sized seating.

ONE CHAIR, SO MANY USES: Lightweight and mobile, you can move them from room to room with ease. Great for gaming and studying in teen bedrooms and college student dorm rooms or even family movie night, game night, play dates, and reading, these simple seats are the perfect room addition.
